thread.title: Football: Cristiano Ronaldo won't let James Rodriguez leave Real Madrid for Chelsea
thread.title_full: Football: Cristiano Ronaldo won't let James Rodriguez leave Real Madrid for Chelsea

title: Football: Cristiano Ronaldo won't let James Rodriguez leave Real Madrid for Chelsea

organizations.name: real madrid for chelsea premier league

text:
Premier League giants Chelsea could miss out on James Rodriguez because Cristiano Ronaldo wants him to stay at Real Madrid. [PHOTO: COURTESY] 
Reports claim the Colombian playmaker is a summer target for Antonio Conte, who is keen to make a number of big-name signings ahead of Chelseaâ€™s expected return to the Champions League. 
Rodriguez was strongly linked with a Stamford Bridge switch in January but Real Madrid were reluctant to sell due to their global transfer ban. 
Spanish newspaper Marca claims star man Ronaldo will kick up a fuss to keep Rodriguez at the Real Madrid. 
The two Real Madrid stars are good friends and Ronaldo is keen to keep Rodriguez at Real Madrid.
